post.body: WTF?
no, we just walked the streets, took tons of photos, and talked to as many people as possible... and ate... a lot.
go see it as soon as you get back from Asheville. Truly fanastic movie... Funny how most it takes place in new Orleans
I've always liked wolfpack football...divided fan;)
Sooo over it. G'night.
Wedding? Tomorrow morning... Oh my. So wanting to continue a great evening with friends and iPhones!
getting ready for a night with some more of my favorite women :)
Man, the New Year really knows how to bring the stars out...
Dinner with some of my most favorite women.
Oh how the sun looks so lovely on you 2009
A New Year's Eve at home... reviewing the year... excited about all the possibilities for 2009.
watching late-night movie with the Josh-man.
That was in regards to benjamin button... Have yet to see Bond
Benjamin Button... Then dinner with my hottie of a husband. ;)
Just read the sweetest email from one of my brides... man, it feels good to have this kind of job! :)
coffee, pj's, dogs, computer, reliable internet... editing from home. happy.
Two more hours to go... I believe we will have driven a total of 37 by the time we get home.
NC bound... So ready to be home.
Playing the sweet tea... Turnip song... Missing lisa walter!
Lot of Wolf Pack love in Bama this evening... Roll tide roll!
